title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“Palm Desert employees charge that their manager created an atmosphere of hatred and tolerance.” [From the San Bernardino Sun, 21 December 1992. Submitted by J.B. Lawrence, San Bernardino]
